full_threads.body:
Hi Jasmine,

Further to my last email, we have managed to find a way around and it's now working as planned, i.e. the amount being sent to Stripe includes the surcharge. We are rounding it out to 2 decimals.

Thanks and speak soon,

HEATH MAGUIRE

CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU

E. heath@wolfiq.com.au | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271
@joel can we look into this please

Hi Heath and David,

Looks like the credit card isn’t working… See error message below….





Kind Regards,

Jasmine Killey
Assistant to Senior Stylist
Advantage Property Styling

To: Dan Gerber <dan@advantagestyling.com.au>
Cc: WP Perk Support <support@wpperk.com>; Jasmine Killey <jasmine@advantagestyling.com.au>; David McLean <Davidm@advantagestyling.com.au>
Subject: Re: changes to the quote platform from 15/10 discussions

Hi Dan,

All good, we have a done a forced rebuild of the cache, which will cascade down to all live/old quotes etc.

There’s every chance that only Jasmine or internal computers were seeing what Jasmine was, but we took the extra precaution just in case.

Hope that makes sense?

Thanks,
HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU <https://wolfiq.com.au/>
E. heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au> | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

Hi Dan,

Thank you for your feedback. 

We have updated the staging site and ready for you to check.
Let me know if this works for you?
https://staging-proposaladvantage.kinsta.com/YmlkaA/?address=testing-apg

Hi Heath and Joel. Thank you guys. There are still a few things that aren't quite right (sorry). Pls see below:
  • Page 1 (pre-acceptance) - Thanks for adding the stuff to the risk protection on page 1. Let's see if this makes a difference to acceptances. Can we please also make ALL of the Optional Extra headings the same format.
  • Page 1 (pre-acceptance) - This is a new idea, but what if the little switch showed red in the shaded bit when it was off and went green (instead of currently grey) when it is selected? Also, what if the button was more solid in colour. It is a bit of a ghost colour atm.
  • Page 2 (post-acceptance) - On the surcharge, can we please be consistent in how we express this. Currently is says Visa/Mastercard incurs 1.2%, Amex incurs a 1.8% surcharge. Can we please make this consistent by saying 'Visa/Mastercard incurs a 1.2% surcharge, Amex incurs a 1.8% surcharge. Can we please be consistent in how we express this.
  • Page 2 (post-acceptance) - pay with EFT. Unfortunately in the attached link, the amount field seems to have now disappeared altogether?
  • Page 2 (post-acceptance) - I checked to see if the signature glitch is still there. It isn't. However now it says 'sign again' which seems to just float in the middle on nowhere, and it replaced the little circular 'redo' symbol. Can we please keep that re-do symbol there instead of have it replaced with sign again? My concern is that it is ambiguous.
  • Page 2 (post-acceptance) - on my monitor, when you fail to complete the fields, the message is now completely hidden from view. For some reason it scrolls almost up to the top but hides the critical message. See screenshot below. Could we have a popup that occurs next to the PLACE YOUR BOOKING button?
  • Page 2 (post-acceptance) - the new message. Can we please express our phone number as (02) 9310 1611 [please note the spacing formatting]. Sorry, this was our fault for not being clearer on David's notes yesterday.
  • Page 2 (post-acceptance) - failing to tick the Ts and Cs box. This is the most troublesome omission from what I'm told. Is there any way that the little tick box and the tick arrow within it can also be highlighted in RED? I feel this will draw extra attention to it because unlike the other fields, with this one, there is no box highlighted in red to capture people's attention.
Regards Dan Dan Gerber Managing Director Advantage Property Styling Follow us on: M 0412 955 531 | P 02 9310 1611 Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street, BANKSMEADOW NSW 2019 www.advantagestyling.com.au

Hi David,

Sure, we have updated the staging site with the requested changes. 
For the EFT "Amount" bold change. Please see the attached.
https://staging-proposaladvantage.kinsta.com/secure/?prop=UFFHbkgwelNIVWxYby94dFlIVTBhdz09&address=testing-apg

Let us know if this works for you and the confirming to push it to live.
